View Types.Description: A view of the parking lot or Community Hall.
At least a partial view of Bay Lake.
At least a partial view of the Magic Kingdom Theme Park.

Rooms.Description: 1 queen size bed, 1 queen size pull-down murphy bed, and 1 pull-down bunk size bed. Full bath.
2 queen beds, and 1 day bed. Full bath. Resort Studios will not have a typical DVC kitchenette, yet will have a Beverage Center.
1 King size bed in the master bedroom. Living room with queen size pull-down murphy bed, and pull-down bunk size bed. Full kitchen. Full bath and in suite laundry.
1 King size bed in primary bedroom. 2 Queen beds in the secondary bedroom. Living room with 1 Queen & 1 Twin size murphy bed. Full kitchen, 1 full bathroom + 1 split bathroom and in suite laundry.
2 queen beds, and 1 day bed. Full bath. Resort Studios will not have a typical DVC kitchenette, yet will have a Beverage Center.
1 King size bed in primary bedroom. 2 bedrooms with 2 queen beds each. 1 Queen in the media room. Living room with Murphy bed. Full kitchen, 4 bathrooms & in suite laundry.

Signature.Name: Narcoossee's
Signature.Desc: Slip away to this waterfront setting for coastal cuisine with spectacular panoramic views.

Signature.Name: Citricos
Signature.Desc: Dine underneath the lovely London sky in this newly re-imagined restaurant inspired by Mary Poppins Returns.

Signature.Name: Citricos Lounge
Signature.Desc: Unwind in a stylish setting filled with whimsy and elegance where you can enjoy international wines and cocktails—or choose to dine from the Cítricos dinner menu.

Signature.Name: Victoring and Alberts - Dining Room
Signature.Desc: An epicurean odyssey awaits. Come experience the ultimate in fine dining—with just one seating each evening.

Signature.Name: Victoring and Alberts - Queen Victoria's Room
Signature.Desc: Savor a luxurious and intimate dining experience at the award-winning Victoria & Albert’s.

Signature.Name: Victoring and Alberts - Chef's Table
Signature.Desc: Join our world-class culinary team in the kitchen as they personally prepare your one-of-a-kind feast—one mouthwatering course at a time.

Table Service.Name: 1900 Park Fare
Table Service.Desc: Delight in breakfast and dinner buffets while celebrating the magical power of a wish alongside beloved Disney Characters.

Table Service.Name: Grand Floridian Cafe
Table Service.Desc: For casual American dining at Disney’s Grand Floridian Resort & Spa, this elegant yet unpretentious eatery can’t be beat.

Table Service.Name: Enchanted Rose
Table Service.Desc: Please your palate with delectable dishes and shimmering sips when you visit this newly reimagined lounge inspired by Beauty and the Beast.

Quick Service.Name: Gasparilla Island Grill
Quick Service.Desc: Relax and refuel in this casual dining restaurant. Start your day with Mickey Waffles or a breakfast platter. Enjoy a variety of entrees available for lunch and dinner. Selections include an artisan burger, flatbreads and sandwiches featuring bread made fresh daily at the Grand Floridian Bakery. Beer and wine are available.

Quick Service.Name: Beaches Pool Bar & Grill
Quick Service.Desc: Enjoy a drink in style at this gleaming white gazebo bar by the sandy beach and zero-entry pool. Sip on a selection of wines, draft beers and specialty cocktails—like the Sunshine Margarita. Snacks and poolside service are available.

Quick Service.Name: Courtyard Pool Bar
Quick Service.Desc: Enjoy a refreshing dip then a refreshing sip by the largest pool at the Resort. A ping-pong table and 2 TVs provide added entertainment. Specialty cocktails, beer, wine, sangria, a Buffalo chicken wrap, all-beef gourmet hot dogs or pretzels with hummus are available through poolside service.

Pools.Name: Courtyard Pool
Pools.Location: Next to Big Pine Key building

Pools.Name: Beach Pool
Pools.Location: Next to the Resort & Spa building

View Types.Resort View: A View of th pool, garden or parking lot area.
View Types.Preferred View: At least a partial view of Bay Lake.
View Types.Theme Park View: At least a partial view of the Magic Kingdom Theme Park.

Rooms.Deluxe Studio: 1 queen size bed and 1 double size sleeper sofa (Pullout Couch). Also has a kitchenette with a wet bar sink, microwave, toaster and a coffee maker. As well as 1 full bathroom.

Rooms.One Bedroom Villa: 1 King size bed in the master bedroom. Living room with queen size sleeper sofa and sleeper chair. Full kitchen. 2 full bathrooms and in suite laundry.

Rooms.Two Bedroom Villa Dedicated: 1 King size bed in the master bedroom. A Secondary bedroom with 2 queen sized beds. Living room with queen size sleeper sofa and sleeper chair. Full kitchen. 3 full baths and in suite laundry.

Rooms.Two Bedroom Villa Lock-Off: 1 King size bed in primary bedroom. A secondary bedroom with a queen bed and double size sleeper sofa. Living room with 1 Queen sized pullout sleeper sofa & 1 Twin size pullout bed. A Full kitchen, 1 full bathroom + 1 split bathroom and in suite laundry.

Rooms.Grand Villa: 1 King size bed in the master bedroom. Full kitchen. 4 full baths and in suite laundry. 1 queen size sleeper sofa and 1 double size sleeper sofa. Two additional bedrooms each containing 2 queen beds.

Signature.Name: California Grill & Lounge
Signature.Desc: American Seafood Sushi Fine/Signature Dining Prix Fixe Savor delectable, market-inspired cuisine as you take in the sights of Seven Seas Lagoon and Magic Kingdom park.

Signature.Name: California Grill Lounge
Signature.Desc: Partake in an aperitif prior to dinner at this namesake restaurant or dine in the lounge as space allows.

Table Service.Name: Chef Mickey's
Table Service.Desc: Prepare for a Character-filled, all-you-care-to-enjoy breakfast or dinner buffet at Disney’s Contemporary Resort.

Table Service.Name: Steakhouse 71
Table Service.Desc: Gather everyone together for a delicious breakfast, lunch or dinner at this stylish, but casual, steakhouse.

Quick Service.Name: Contempo Cafe
Quick Service.Desc: Discover a satisfying selection of bites and beverages for breakfast, lunch or dinner.

Quick Service.Name: Contemporary Grounds
Quick Service.Desc: Featuring gourmet coffees, iced tea, hot chocolate, smoothies and assorted artisan baked goods, this is the perfect place to energize before you venture to the parks! Joffrey's Coffee™, the Official Specialty Coffee of Walt Disney World Resort.

Quick Service.Name: Cove Bar
Quick Service.Desc: Find specialty cocktails, beer, wine, wraps and salads at this private poolside bar for Guests of Bay Lake Tower and Disney Vacation Club members.

Quick Service.Name: The Sand Bar
Quick Service.Desc: Picnic poolside with burgers, hot dogs and more. Tropical cocktails, draft beer, sangria and wine make it even more fun! Or cool off with a full bar menu and some AC inside the enclosed bar. Dessert items are also available.

Pools.Name: Bay Cove Pool
Pools.Location: Feature pool behind Bay Lake Tower, overlooking Bay Lake.

Pools.Name: Bay Lake Pool
Pools.Location: Secondary pool or quiet pool, that sits near Bay Lake.

Pools.Name: Contemporary Feature Pool
Pools.Location: Primary pool that sits directly behind the Contemporary.

View Types.Resort View: A View of the parking lot area or the loading bay.
View Types.Preferred View: At least a partial view of the lake. Some views can see the magic kingdom.
View Types.Bungalow View: At least a partial view of the lake. Some views can see the magic kingdom.

Rooms.Deluxe Studio: 1 queen-size bed, 1 queen-size pull-down bed, and 1 pull-down bunk size bed. Full bath plus additional sink and shower.

Rooms.Two Bedroom Bungalow: 1 King size bed in the master bedroom. Living room with queen-size pull-down bed and a pull-down bunk size bed. Second bedroom 1 queen bed and a pull-down bunk size bed. Full kitchen. 2 full baths and in suite laundry.

Table Service.Name: Kona Cafe
Table Service.Desc: This relaxed café infuses a bit of Asian zest into traditional American meals and features an onstage sushi kitchen.

Table Service.Name: Tambu Lounge
Table Service.Desc: Pull up a stool at this enchanting watering hole where you’ll find tropical drinks and Hawaiian-inspired appetizers to Tiki your fancy—from flavorful chicken wings and marinated barbecue pork ribs to island-themed specialty cocktails and a full bar menu.

Table Service.Name: Ohana
Table Service.Desc: Start your day with a bountiful breakfast or sit down to a Polynesian-themed dinner—both served family-style.

Table Service.Name: Trader Sam's Grog Grotto
Table Service.Desc: You grotto check out this tropical tiki bar that captures the romance of the South Seas through unique food and drinks. Be sure to arrive early!

Quick Service.Name: Capt. Cook's
Quick Service.Desc: Explore your options each morning as you start the day with a Mickey Waffle or banana-stuffed Tonga Toast. For lunch or dinner, discover an adventurous assortment of sandwiches, salads and more. Beer and wine are also available.

Quick Service.Name: Kona Island
Quick Service.Desc: Say 'aloha' to coffee and pastries in the morning and grab-and-go sushi later in the day.

Quick Service.Name: Barefoot Pool Bar
Quick Service.Desc: Kick off your shoes and enjoy the white sandy beach as you sip on Tiki drinks and take in views of Magic Kingdom park. Try an amazing cocktail, refreshing beer, delicious wine or a smoothie!

Quick Service.Name: Oasis Bar & Grill
Quick Service.Desc: Take a break from the sun and imbibe in some fun at this poolside retreat with tropical cocktails, wine, beer and assorted beverages.

Quick Service.Name: Pineapple Lanai
Quick Service.Desc: Take a break from the sun and imbibe in some fun at this poolside retreat with tropical cocktails, wine, beer and assorted beverages.

Pools.Name: Lava Pool
Pools.Location: Feature pool behind the Seven Seas Marina and Barefoot Pool Bar.

Pools.Name: Oasis Pool
Pools.Location: Secondary leisure pool, nustled in a lush garden next to Tokelau.

Pools.Name: Oasis Patio
Pools.Location: Relax in your own private shaded area close to the Oasis pool.

View Types.Resort View: A View of th pool, garden or parking lot area.
View Types.Preferred View: Views of the lakes, ponds, or golf courses.
View Types.Premium View: At least a partial view of 7 seas lagoon
View Types.Theme Park View: At least a partial view of the Magic Kingdom Theme Park.

Rooms.Duo Studio: 1 queen-size pull down bed, 1 full bath and a kitchenette.

Rooms.Deluxe Studio: 1 queen size bed, 1 queen size pull down murphy. Full bath & Kitchenette. *Only Studio with a dishwasher*

Rooms.One Bedroom Villa: 1 King size bed in the master bedroom. Living room with 1 queen size murphy bed, and 1 pull-down bunk-size bed. Full kitchen 2 Full baths and in suite laundry.

Rooms.Two Bedroom Villa Dedicated: 1 King size bed in the master bedroom, Second bedroom with 2 queen beds. Living room with 1 queen-size murphy bed, and 1 pull-down bunk-size bed. Full kitchen, 3 full baths & in suite laundry.

Rooms.Two Bedroom Villa Lock-Off: 1 King size bed in the master bedroom, Second bedroom with a queen bed, and 1 queen-size pull-down bed. Living room with 1 queen-size murphy bed, and 1 pull-down bunk-size bed. Full kitchen, 3 full baths & in suite laundry.

Rooms.Two Bedroom Penthouse: 1 King size bed in the master bedroom. Second bedroom with 2 queen beds. Living room with 1 queen-size pull-down bed. 3 full baths.

Table Service.Name: Casual Dining at Wailulu Bar & Grill
Table Service.Desc: Delight in a tropical getaway when you indulge in delicious flavors inspired by cuisine from the South Pacific Islands.

Pools.Name: Cove Pool
Pools.Location: A zero depth entry pool that offers relaxation for guests, located next to the Island Tower.

Pools.Name: Moana's Voyage Splash Area
Pools.Location: Little ones can embrace their inner wayfinder with this whimsical, new splash area inspired by Disney’s beloved movie Moana.

View Types.Resort View: Views of Pool, Bay Lake, Woodlands, Courtyard, Disney's Wilderness Lodge or Boulder Ridge Villas at Disney's Wilderness Lodge.
View Types.Cabin View: At least a partial view of the lake. Some views can see the magic kingdom.

Rooms.Deluxe Studio: 1 queen size bed and 1 queen size sleeper sofa.A kitchenette and a Full bath with either; a. tub/shower combination or b. walk-in shower.

Rooms.One Bedroom Villa: 1 King size bed in the master bedroom. Full kitchen. Full bath and in suite laundry. Living room with queen size sleeper sofa.

Rooms.Two Bedroom Villa Dedicated: 1 King size bed in primary bedroom. 2 Queen beds in the secondary bedroom. Living room with 1 Queen & 1 Twin size murphy bed. Full kitchen, 1 full bathroom + 1 split bathroom and in suite laundry.

Rooms.Two Bedroom Villa Lock-Off: 1 King size bed in primary bedroom. 1 Queen bed & 1 pulldown murphy bed in the secondary bedroom. Living room with 1 Queen & 1 Twin size murphy bed. Full kitchen, 1 full bathroom + 1 split bathroom and in suite laundry.

Rooms.Grand Villa: 1 King size bed in the master bedroom. Full kitchen. 3 full baths and in suite laundry. 1 queen size sleeper sofa. Two additional bedrooms each containing 2 queen beds.

Rooms.Two Bedroom Cabin: 1 King size bed in the master bedroom. Full kitchen. 2 full baths and in suite laundry. Second bedroom with queen bed and pull-down bunk size bed. Living room with queen size sleeper sofa and sleeper chair.

Signature.Name: Artist Point Storybook Dining
Signature.Desc: Savor a delicious dinner that the whole family will love—with appearances from Disney Characters from the Disney film Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs.

Table Service.Name: Whispering Canyon Cafe
Table Service.Desc: Round up the whole family for hearty Western fare with all-you-care-to-enjoy skillets and shenanigans!

Table Service.Name: Geyser Point Bar & Grill
Table Service.Desc: Stake your claim at a poolside eatery featuring explorer-worthy bites, trails-end spirits and stunning views of Bay Lake.

Quick Service.Name: Roaring Fork
Quick Service.Desc: Start your day with popular breakfast dishes, including Mickey-shaped waffles, eggs, freshly baked pastries and more. Stop by for lunch and dinner to enjoy savory burgers, sandwiches and house-smoked BBQ. Beer and wine are also available.

Quick Service.Name: Territory Lounge
Quick Service.Desc: Curl up in this rustic, lodge-like bar filled with cozy warmth! You can order snacks, small plates, sweets and cocktails.

Pools.Name: Copper Creek Springs Pool
Pools.Location: A dazzling heated pool surrounded by nature next to Copper Creek Falls.

Pools.Name: Springs Play Area
Pools.Location: Secondary leisure pool, nustled in a lush garden next to Tokelau.

Table Service.Name: Steakhouse 71
Table Service.Desc: Gather everyone together for a delicious breakfast, lunch or dinner at this stylish, but casual, steakhouse.

Quick Service.Name: Roaring Fork
Quick Service.Desc: Start your day with popular breakfast dishes, including Mickey-shaped waffles, eggs, freshly baked pastries and more. Stop by for lunch and dinner to enjoy savory burgers, sandwiches and house-smoked BBQ. Beer and wine are also available.

Quick Service.Name: Territory Lounge
Quick Service.Desc: Curl up in this rustic, lodge-like bar filled with cozy warmth! You can order snacks, small plates, sweets and cocktails.

Pools.Name: Boulder Ridge Cove Pool
Pools.Location: A dazzling heated pool surrounded by nature next to Copper Creek Falls.

View Types.Resort View: A view of the cabins, forest or pool areas.

Rooms.One Bedroom Cabin: 1 queen-size bed and 1 pull-down bunk size bed in the bedroom. 1 queen-size pull-down bed in the living room. A full bathroom plus additional sink and shower.

Table Service.Name: Hoop Dee Doo
Table Service.Desc: Hightail it to a high-spirited music-and-comedy revue accompanied by a fantastic feast.

Quick Service.Name: Meadow Snack Bar
Quick Service.Desc: Go grazing in the great outdoors. Open-air eats include fresh salads, tasty sandwiches and light snacks. Top it off with some frozen treats. Beer and sodas are also available.

Quick Service.Name: Crockett's Tavern
Quick Service.Desc: Whet your whistle and settle into Crockett’s Tavern. Sit for a while in the reimagined lounge or mosey up to the walk-up window beside Pioneer Hall for a drink to-go. You can rustle up some grub including sliders, chicken bites and more, or indulge in a wine, beer or cocktail.

Quick Service.Name: Trail's End Restaurant
Quick Service.Desc: Wheel yer wagon over to this Old West eatery where you can grab some grub—morning, noon or night!

Quick Service.Name: The Chuck Wagon
Quick Service.Desc: Pack up your hunger and take a trip to flavor country, courtesy of this culinary camper serving classic fare and savory snacks.

Pools.Name: Meadow Swimmin' Pool
Pools.Location: In the Meadow Section of the resort.

Pools.Name: Meadow Recreation Area
Pools.Location: In the Meadow Section of the CFW.

Pools.Name: Wilderness Swimmin' Pool
